name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicBezelCircularText
desc: A template for displaying a circular complication with text along the bezel.

items.name: init(circularTemplate: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircular, textProvider: CLKTextProvider?)
items.desc: Creates a circular template with text that wraps around the bezel.

items.name: var textProvider: CLKTextProvider?
items.desc: The text to display along the bezel.
